definition: marked by humanistic values and devotion to human welfare, an advocate of the principles of humanism
details:
adjective
- marked by humanistic values and devotion to human welfare
= synonyms: human-centered
- of or relating to or characteristic of humanitarianism
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of humanitarianism
noun
- an advocate of the principles of humanism
= synonyms: humanist
- someone devoted to the promotion of human welfare and to social reforms
= synonyms: improver, do-gooder
